byas so/ /rgyal po dang rgyal po'i bu mos bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba mang pos yon tan la stsogs pas yon tan dang ldan par brjod nas/ btsun pa bdag gi bu mos nyid kyis gos ngur smrig gyon pa thos nas/ de nas bzung

ste dang gi bar du gos ngur smrig gyon no/ /nyid kyis gdugs tshod lan cig gsol ba thos nas bu mos kyang bza' ba lan cig zos so/ /nyid kyis mal stan chen po spangs pa thos nas/ nyal khri chung ba la nyal lo/ /nyid kyi ma

me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la stsogs pa la sred pa med pa thos nas/ me tog gi phreng ba dang spos la stsogs pa la chags pa med pa skyes so/ /rang gi nye du rnams bdag gis gso'o zhes 'phrin bskur nas/ gnyen cig la

yang blta ba mi 'dug go/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i yon tan dang ldan pa ni bdag gi bu mo yin no zhes gsol to/ /rgyal po chen po ya mtshan mi che'o/ /'di da lta khyed srung bar byed pa'i rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes

yongs su ma smin pa rang gis bsrung ngo / /sngar bsrung ba med cing ri la stsogs pa la 'gro ba na/ ye shes yongs su ma rdzogs pa rang gis bsrungs so zhes gsungs nas/ mi'am ci zla ba'i skyes rabs gsungs te stan las bzhengs

nas gshegs so/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal bu gzhon nu dga' bo rgyal por dbang bskur ba dang / khang pa gsar pa'i nang du zhugs te bkra shis pa'i bag ma blangs nas nye bar gnas so/ /de'i khyim du gshegs nas gzhon nu lhung

bzed zung cig ces rab tu dbyung bar dgongs nas bkra shis brjod de/ gdan la bzhengs nas gshegs so/ /ljongs kyi dge ba'i bu mos 'gro ba mthong ngo / /'phags pa'i bu myur du shog ces brjod nas blta'o/ /des kyang bcom ldan

'das kyi lhung bzed gzung bar ma nus nas gtsug lag khang nyid du gshegs so/ /bcom ldan 'das de la 'dod pa med pa nyid kyis rab tu 'byung ba byed do/ /'di ltar bcom ldan 'das grong khyer ser skyar gshegs shing nyi ma gsum pa la

dga' bo rab tu byung bar byas so/ /nyi ma bdun pa la sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mas gzhon nu rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du btang ngo / /bu stong phrag nyi shu'i dge slong 'khor dang bcas pa 'di rnams ltos/ gser gyi kha dog can gyi

tshangs pa'i gzugs kyi mdog can dge sbyong 'di ni khyed kyi yab po/ /'di la gter chen po yod cing de 'thon pa nas bzung nas gter mthong ba med do/ /song la nor slongs shig /bdag khyed kyi bu gzhon nu yin no/ /rgyal por dbang

bskur ba thob nas 'khor los sgyur ba la dbang byed par 'gyur ro/ /bdag la nor gyi don du nor stsal du gsol/ yab kyi nor bu bdag yin no zhes gsol cig ces smras pa dang / gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar song ste/ yab kyi drung

du dga' ba skyes so/ /sems spro bar gyur to/ /dge sbyong des khyed kyi grib ma ni de'o zhes brjod nas/ gzhan yang rang gi rigs pas brjod cing 'khod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod kyi mthar rjes su yi rang ba mdzad nas gdan las bzhengs te

gshegs so/ /gzhon nus bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/ bdag la dge slong nor stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rjes su 'brangs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu phyir log la nga'i rjes su ma 'gro zhes pa dang / rjes su

'brang ba rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das dang 'grogs nas byon te ldog par ma nus nas/ gzhon nu bcom ldan 'das dang lhan cig kun dga' ra ba nyid du phyin no/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsams pa/ 'di yab kyi nor 'dod cing

'jig rten pa'i nor ni 'tshe ba dang bcas pa yin/ da ni gzhon nu la byang chub snying po des thob pa'i 'phags pa'i nor rnam pa bdun byin na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nor gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur bar dgongs nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri

'i bu bos te/ de'i phyir na shA ri'i bu khyod kyis gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin rab tu phyung zhes brjod nas rab tu byung ba byas so/ /slar yang rgyal po gzhon nu'i sdug bsngal cher skyes te bsran par ma nus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi

gnas su phyin te/ btsun pa 'phags pa ma dang pha yis rjes su ma gnang ba'i bu rab tu 'byung bar byed pa ma legs so zhes dam pa bslangs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la dam pa byin no/ /slar yang nyi ma gnyis pa la rgyal po'i

gnas su gdugs tshod gsol nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /rgyal pos btsun pa nyid dka' ba spyod pa'i dus su lha cig bdag gi drung du nye bar 'ongs nas khyed kyi bu dus las 'das so zhes smras so/ /de'i tshig la yid

ches pa med cing bdag gi sras byang chub ma thob bar du dus las 'da' bar mi byed do/ /de'i tshig bdag gis bkag go zhes brjod do/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ da lta ji ltar khyod yid ches par byed/

sngar rus pa mthong nas khyed kyi bu shi'o zhes zer ba la yid ches par ma byas so/ /'di'i don 'byung ba ni chos skyong ba chen po'i skyes rabs su bshad do/ /gtam gyi mthar rgyal pos phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas so/ /de ltar

bcom ldan 'das kyi yab 'bras bu gsum la so sor gnas nas dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor du byas so/ /slar yang rgyal po'i khab du gshegs nas bsil ba'i tshal du bzhugs so/ /de'i tshe khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis

shing rta lnga brgya'i nor khyer nas rgyal po'i khab du rang nyid dga' ba'i grogs kyi khang par song ste/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byon no zhes pa thos nas shin du snga bar lha'i mthus sgo phye ste/ ston pa'i drung du nye bar song nas chos

thos te rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /nyi ma gnyis pa la sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin pa chen po phul lo/ /mnyan yod du gshegs pa'i phyir du ston pa'i drung du dam bca' blangs nas bar gyi lam

dpag tshad bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i gnas su 'bum phrag re re'i nor byin nas dpag tshad re re'i gtsug lag khang byas so/ /rgyal byed tshal bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis nyos nas las kha gsar pa byed cing dbus su stobs bcu

pa'i dri'i gtsang khang byed do/ /de la bskor ba rnams la gnas brtan chen po brgyad bcu'i bzhugs gnas so/ /chig thog dang nyis thog dang khang pa ring po dang / bsti gnas la stsogs pa'i bzhugs gnas dang / rdzing bu dang /

'chag sa dang / mtshan mo'i bzhugs gnas dang / nyin mo'i bzhugs gnas so/ /bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyi nor spel te yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs yid la 'thad pa'i gtsug lag khang byed do/ /stobs bcu pa gyon pa'i phyir

du pho nya ba btang ngo / /ston pas pho nya ba'i 'phrin gsan nas dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po'i 'khor du byas te rgyal po'i khab nas phyir byon te go rims bzhin du grong khyer mnyan yod du byon no/ /gtso bo chen po gtsug lag khang chen po

sta gon byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal byed tshal du byon pa'i nyin mo bu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan no/ /slar yang brgyan pa nyid kyi gzhon nu lnga brgya dang bcas pa btang ngo / /de 'khor dang bcas pa kha dog lnga'i gos yang dag par

'bar ba'i rgyal mtshan lnga brgya thogs nas stobs bcu pa'i mdun du song bar gyur to/ /de rnams kyi phyi ma la legs bzangs chen mo dang / legs bzangs ma chung ba ste bu mo gnyis gzhon nu ma lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang

ba'i bum pa lag par thogs nas phyir 'thon no/ /de'i phyi ma la tshong dpon gyi chung ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan nas bud med lnga brgya dang bcas pa gser gyis gang ba'i sder ma chen po thogs nas phyir 'thon to/ /thams cad phyin

nas tshong dpon rang nyid gos bzang po gyon no/ /de bzhin du gos bzang po gyon pa'i tshong dpon lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor dge bsnyen 'di rnams mdun du byas nas/ dge slong gi

dge 'dun chen po rnams 'khor du byas te/ rang nyid kyi sku lus kyi 'od kyis gser gyi bcud kyi gong bu lta bu dang mtshungs pa dang / nags tshal gyi bar du snang bar mdzad cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol pa sangs rgyas kyi dpal

zla med cing mtshungs pa med pa rgyal byed tshal gyi nang du byon no/ /de nas mgon med zas sbyin gyis zhus pa/ btsun pa gtsug lag khang 'di ji lta bu la dbul bar bgyi/ khyim bdag gtsug lag khang 'di 'ong ba dang 'gro ba'i dge slong gi

dge 'dun rnams la phul cig /legs so bcom ldan 'das zhes tshong dpon chen pos gser gyi ril ba spyi blugs blangs nas stobs bcu pa'i phyag tu chu bsgrengs te rgyal byed tshal gyi gtsug lag khang 'di 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i

phyogs bzhi'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i dge 'dun la sbyin zhes phul lo/ /ston pas gtsug lag khang bzhes nas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do/ /grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing / /de ltar ri dgas la sogs pa'i/ /sdig sbrul

dang ni sbrang bu dang / /ba mo dang ni char pas so/ /de ltar rlung dang shin du dro/ /so sor lus la gos pa dang / /khang nang gnas nas bde ba skyes/ /khang par bsam gtan lhag mthong rnams/ /dge 'dun gtsug lag khang 'bul ba/ /sangs

rgyas mchog gis bsngags par mdzad/ /skyes bu mkhas pas de yi phyir/ /bdag nyid kyi ni phyir du ni/ /dga' bas gtsug lag khang byed pa/ /mang du thos pa gnas pa yin/ /de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung / /gos dang mal cha stan

dang ni/ /de rnams sems ni drang pos 'bul/ /rab tu dang ba'i sems kyis so/ /des ni de la chos bstan to/ /sdug bsngal thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir/ /gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang / /rten med mya ngan 'das par byed ces bya ba'i

gtsug lag khang gi phan yon bshad do/ /mgon med zas sbyin gyis nyi ma gnyis pa nas bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i mgo brtsams so/ /sa khams byas pa'i khang bzangs ni zla ba bzhis grub bo/ /slar yang mgon med zas sbyin gyi gtsug lag khang chen

po zla ba dgus grub bo/ /gtsug lag khang chen po la yang bye ba stong phrag bcwa brgyad nyid song ngo / /'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongs su btang ngo / /slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das rnam par

gzigs kyi dus su tshong dpon kun gyi grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang po'i rkang pa'i rmig rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas/ gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can gyi dus su

dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gyi bus gser gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos pa'i sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi dus su

tshong dpon bkra shis zhes bya bas gser gyi sa gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dpag tshad phyed kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi dus su tshong dpon 'pho ba med pa zhes bya

bas gser gyi pha gu lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas nyid du rgyang grags bzhi'i tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi dus su tshong dpon drag po zhes bya bas gser gyi rus sbal rgyun mi 'chad

pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gnyis kyi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dus su tshong dpon bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bas gser gyi pha gu rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos nas gnas

de nyid du rgyang grags gcig gi tshad kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus su tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba phrag bcwa brgyad kyi dbyig gis gser gyi 'dra men du byas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus

sa gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags phyed kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so/ /gnas 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no/ /'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ji srid pa nas yongs

su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas su bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa 'di ni nye ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o/ /de'i lugs kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad do/ /skyes pa rabs kyi gleng gzhi'i bshad pa

rdzogs s+ho// // @#/ /rgya gar skad du/ A TA nA Ti ya sU tra/ bod skad du/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal

po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs so/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po gnod sbyin mang po'i sde dang / dri za mang po'i sde dang grul bum gyi sde mang po dang klu'i sde mang po rnams phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so/ /phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so/ /

phyogs bzhi skyob cing gnas so/ /mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod

do/ /gnod sbyin de rnams las kyang gang la las bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun gsol te bsnyun gsol nas ji ltar snying po dang snying po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing

phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'i phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dpyod cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs

gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin ma

rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod

sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i

rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / 'dod pa log par spyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i chos

bstan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa mdzad la/ gnod sbyin gang de rnams srog gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang /

'dod pa log par spyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to/ /

btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang 'dug pa la brten no/ /sgra med cing dbyangs med par dben par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do/ /so sor dge sbyong

rnams 'thun par gnas so/ /de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnas yod do/ /gang zhig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/ de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par

bya ste/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang 'tshe ba med pa dang bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das

kyis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ngo / /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba shes te/ de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to/ /spyan
ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /'byung po rnams la brtse ba yi/ /gtsug tor can la'ang phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon med rnams la gdung ba yi/ /thams cad skyob la
phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi/ /'khor ba 'jig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /gser thub la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnam grol mdzad pa yi/ /

'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan/ /nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal kun las sgrol mdzad pa/ /gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad/ /gang yang 'jig rten par gyur pa/ /

ji lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i/ /de rnams la ni phra ma med/ /'jigs pa med pa chen po'o/ /gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa/ /lha dang mi la phan pa yin/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /'jigs pa med pa

chen po ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /de ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin/ /gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/ /de ni nyin mo zhes brjod do/ /gting ni zab pa'i rgya

mtsho yi/ /de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni/ /skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/ /de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po

chen po grags chen ldan/ /dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong / /dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos

pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang

mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyod phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /

rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang yang yi dags rjod byed pa/ /phra ma rgyab kyi sha can dang / /srog gcod pa la chags pa dang / /skye bo ma lus 'joms pa'o/ /

'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod/ /de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/ /rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa/ /grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/ /grul bum 'khor dang

bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i rgyud kyis

sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /

rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /

gang nas gang du shar gyur pa/ /der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste/ /nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /de ni mtshan mor brjod par byed/ /gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /de yi chu ni bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar

der ni skyes gyur pa'i/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni/ /skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/ /de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan / /klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ /'di yi

ming ni mig mi bzang / /klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /de yang sangs

rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /

mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /

gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi snyan/ /lhun po blta na sdug ri dga'/ /der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni/ /bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med/ /de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med/ /rmo ba yang ni med pa yin/ /dka' spyad

med par 'bras smin zhing / /mi rnams yongs su longs spyod do/ /sbun med ma grugs shin du dag /dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan/ /'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed cing / /de bzhin btsos nas longs spyod do/ /ba lang rkang gcig

la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/ /skyes pa'i bzhon pa la

zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /gzhon nu ma yi bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/ /gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas/ /

phyogs kun du ni rjes su 'gro/ /gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do/ /glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/ /lha yi bzhon pa la gnas nas/ /khang bzang dang ni khyogs dang ni/ /rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/ /de'i yang grub pa'i grong khyer

ni/ /dri med bar snang la gnas pa/ /lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong / /pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni/ /nA Ta'i grong dang pha rol gyi/ /ku shi ta'i grong yin no/ /byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas/ /skyes bo'i tshogs pa mang po gnas/ /

dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/ /slar yang drang srong chen po dang / /rgyal po chen po lus ngan po/ /bi sA NA zhes pa rgyal po'i pho brang ngo / /de'i phyir rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /

lus ngan po zhes brjod do/ /so sor rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang de'i gzi brjid dang dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo / /sa gzhi yang ni bcud ldan no/ /

gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do/ /der ni b+ha ga la ba tI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o/ /gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so/ /der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras/ /sna tshogs bya rnams lhan cig gnas/ /rma bya khrung khrung

sgra sgrogs shing / /khu byug rnams ni tshan tshan gnas/ /shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs shing / /de nas yang ni ngur pa dang / /gong mo nags kyi bya dag ni/ /nags kyi rdzing bur gnas pa'o/ /ne tsho ri skegs de sgra 'byin/ /daN Ta mA Ta bya dkar ni/ /

dus kun du ni mdzes par byed/ /lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes/ /'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul/ /skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin brjod/ /de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi

bdag po ste/ /'di yi ming ni lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig

go/ /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyis sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /

dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /

sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dir ni drang srong chen pos lcang lo can gyi pho brang dang bcas pas srungs shig /dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba

med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po gang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa 'am dge slong ma dang bcas pa 'am dge bsnyen dang bcas pa 'am dge bsnyen ma dang bcas pa rnams la/ 'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang

gis de bsrung ba dang yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yid la zung cig /de'i yang mi ma yin rnams so/ /gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po'am gnod sbyin gyi

'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho'am dri za mo'am dri za'i bu pho'am dri za'i bu mo'am dri za'i blon po chen po'am dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho'am grul bum mo'am grul bum gyi bu pho

'am grul bum gyi bu mo'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho'am klu mo'am klu'i bu pho'am klu'i bu mo'am klu'i blon po chen po'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor

ram/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro'am rjes su 'gro 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams ni drang srong chen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin

zhes bya'o/ /grong ngam grong rdal lam bkur sti byed pa'am sti stang du byed pa la drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis de thob pa ma yin no/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba la gzhi 'am gnas med do/ /drang srong chen po mi ma

yin rnams dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis lhan cig tu gnas pa'ang mi 'thob po/ /drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi bka' mnyan par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa

dang / pha rol la smod pa dang rtsod pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu 'bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyi mgo bo tshal pa bdun du gsheg par byed do/ /

drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/ /de rnams kyis 'di ltar rgyal po chen po la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la brjod par byed do/ /rgyal po'i

skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu rnams la brjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/ /drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ ma ga d+ha'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na de ma

thag tu rgyal po la brjod par byed do/ /rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la brjod par byed do/ /skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la brjod par byed pa bzhin no/ /drang srong chen po de yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal

po la chom rkun gyis gnod pa byed par brjod do/ /drang srong chen po 'di lta bu mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/ /de ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams la brjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal

po'i skyes bu la brjod par byed do/ /skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la brjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po de ni mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal bar brjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po mi ma

yin gang zhig gnod sbyin pho 'am gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho 'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu

pho'am dri za'i bu mo'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho 'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi

'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen po 'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor ram/ rab tu sdang ba'i sems gyis dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am

dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / gnas pa dang lhan cig tu gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang / 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin

rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung

nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang /

gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin rnams dang gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/ dbang po zla ba chu zla dang / /b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /tsan da na dang 'od mchog dang / /

mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang / /gang ba smin drug phug dang ni/ /

'tsho ba dang ni btang gzung dang / /sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya' shing 'dzin/ /sa skyong rab tu rtogs pa dang / /ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang / /lnga len gtum po Al ba ka /srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang / /

zho gdong nor bu nor bu spyod/ /de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so/ /'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro

sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed

pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/ /drang srong chen po 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig /dge slong dang

dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang / legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po de ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag rnams ni bya ba

mang ba dang byed pa mang bas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyed rnams da ni 'gro bar gyis shig /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba

byas nas der mi snang bar gyur to/ /gnod sbyin de rnams kyang langs nas gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das la snyun gsol

te bsnyun gsol nas snying po dang snying po med pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig gis ming dang

rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo las skabs rab mchog dang po'o// //de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis

de'i mtshan mo 'das nas dge slong rnams bos nas dge slong dag 'di'i mtshan mo rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnams dang dri za'i sde mang po dang / grul bum gyi sde mang po dang / klu'i sde mang po dang /

phyogs bzhi bsrung zhing gnas so/ /phyogs bzhir tshan tshan du gnas so/ /phyogs bzhi skyong zhing gnas so/ /mtshan mo 'ongs te kha dog sna tshogs pa can gyis bya rgod phung po'i ri 'ba' zhig snang bar byas te/

bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste song nas nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /dge slong dag dang gnod sbyin de rnams gang la la zhig gis nga la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis

nga la snyun gsol te bsnyun gsol nas ji ltar snying po dang snying po med pa'i gtam 'dri zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis nga la thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag gis ming dang rigs dpyod

cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /gang su dag cang mi smra bar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dge slong dag dang rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus nga la 'di skad ces gsol nas/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa

yod pa rnams btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin ma rungs pa gang la la zhig bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /

gnod sbyin 'bring po gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin dman pa gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das

la dad par gyur to/ /gnod sbyin gang la la zhig btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la ma dad par gyur pa'i rgyu gang lags/ btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis srog gcod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba'i chos

bstan pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba'i chos bstan pa dang / myos par 'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba'i chos bstan pas so/ /gnod sbyin gang de rnams btsun pas srog

gcod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / ma byin par len pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / 'dod pas log par spyod pa spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / brdzun du smra ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pa dang / myos par

'gyur ba'i chang gi btung ba spong ba la mi dga' bar gyur pas so/ /de rnams la mi dga' zhing mi 'dod par gyur to/ /btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nyan thos ji snyed yod pa rnams 'brog dgon pa'i lam du zhugs nas nyal ba dang 'dug

pa dang brten to/ /sgra med cing dbyangs med par dben par gnas shing 'du 'dzi'i 'tshe ba med do/ /so sor dge sbyong rnams 'thun zhing gnas so/ /de na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams kyi gnas yod do/ /gang zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi

gsung rab la ma dad par gyur te/ de rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir btsun pa bcom ldan 'das la bslab par bya ste/ lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrung du gsol/ dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams

la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /dge slong rnams la bdag gis cang mi gsung ba'i tshul gyis gnang ba byin no/ /de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus gnang ba byin pa shes te/

de'i tshe 'di ltar lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis srungs shig ces gsol to/ /spyan ldan dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /rnam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can rnams la brtse ba yi/ /gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/ /mgon med

rnams la gdung ba yi/ /thams cad skyob la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms pa yi/ /'khor ba 'jig la phyag 'tshal lo/ /bram ze dpal dang ldan pa yi/ /gser thub la yang phyag 'tshal lo/ /sems can

rnam grol mdzad pa yi/ /'od srung la ni phyag 'tshal lo/ /shAkya'i sras ni dpal dang ldan/ /nyi ma'i rgyud la phyag 'tshal lo/ /sdug bsngal kun las grol mdzad pa'i/ /gang zhig chos ni rab ston mdzad/ /gang yang 'jig rten par

gyur pa/ /ji lta ba bzhin gzigs gyur pa'i/ /de rnams la ni phra ma med/ /'jigs pa med pa chen po ni/ /gang zhig gau tam phyag byed pa/ /lha dang mi la phan pa yin/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /'jigs pa med pa

chen po ste/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang zhig tu ni nub cing 'char/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /der ni mtshan mor 'gyur ba yin/ /gang du nyi ma shar gyur pa/ /der ni nyin mo zhes brjod do/ /gting ni zab pa'i

rgya mtsho yi/ /de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni shar gyi phyogs kyi ni/ /skye bo rnams la 'di brjod do/ /de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/ /

rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni rgyal po yul 'khor skyong / /dri za 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /

dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen

khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /

rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang yang yi dags rjod byed pa/ /phra ma rgyab kyi sha can dang / /srog gcod pa la chags pa dang / /skye bo ma lus
'joms pa'o/ /'dir ni lho yi phyogs gnas pa'i/ /skye bo rnams la 'di skad brjod/ /de yi gnas ni yongs skyong ba/ /rgyal po chen po grags ldan pa/ /grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /ming ni 'phags

skyes po zhes bya/ /grul bum 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /

de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i rgyud kyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /

dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di brjod de/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su

ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ /gang nas gang du shar gyur pa/ /der ni nyin mor 'gyur ba ste/ /nyin mo zhes ni brjod pa yin/ /gang du nyi ma nub gyur pa/ /der ni mtshan

mor rjod par byed/ /gting ni zab pa'i rgya mtsho yi/ /de yi chu yi bcud bzang ngo / /de ltar der ni skyes gyur pa'i/ /rgya mtsho'i chu yi bcud bzhin no/ /'dir ni nub kyi phyogs kyi ni/ /skye bo rnams la 'di brjod de/ /

de yi phyogs ni kun skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ /'di yi ming ni mig mi bzang / /klu yi 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /de yi bu ni mang po

rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /

thag ring nas ni phyag bgyid do/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /

de phyir de ltar 'di brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /gang zhig byang phyogs sgra mi snyan/ /lhun
po lta na sdug ri dga'/ /der skyes pa yi mi rnams ni/ /bdag gir yongs su bzung ba med/ /de rnams sa bon 'debs pa med/ /rmo ba yang ni med pa yin/ /dka' spyad med par 'bras smin nas/ /mi rnams
yongs su longs spyod de/ /sbun med ma grugs shin du dag /dri bzang 'bras ni 'bras bur ldan/ /'bras kyi 'o ma la 'tshed cing / /de bzhin btsos nas longs spyod do/ /ba lang rkang gcig la zhon nas/ /

yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /rkang pa gcig pa'i phyugs zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bud med kyi ni bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/ /skyes pa'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/ /

yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /gzhon nu ma yi bzhon pa la/ /zhon nas yul dang phyogs su 'gro/ /gzhon nu'i bzhon pa la zhon nas/ /yul dang phyogs su 'gro bar byed/ /bzhon pa de rnams la zhon nas/ /

phyogs kun du ni rjes su 'gro/ /gtso bo rgyal po khyad med do/ /glang chen bzhon dang rta yi bzhon/ /lha yi bzhon pa la gnas nas/ /khang bzang dang ni khyogs rnams ni/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de'i yang grub

pa'i grong khyer ni/ /dri med bar snang la gnas pa/ /lcang lo can dang ku sha'i grong / /pha rol ku sha'i grong dang ni/ /nA TA'i grong dang pha rol gyi/ /ku shi ta'i grong yin no/ /byang gi phyogs na thams cad rgyas/ /skye bo'i

tshogs pa mang po gnas/ /dgu bcu rtsa dgu grong mkha' la/ /rgyal po'i pho brang lcang lo can/ /slar yang drang srong chen po dang / /rgyal po chen po lus ngan po/ /cog ldan zhes pa rgyal po chen po'i pho brang ngo / /de'i phyir

rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang lus ngan po zhes brjod do/ /so sor rab tu gsal zhing zhi ba dang de dang der ni de dang de mdangs dang de'i gzi brjid dang dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i rgyal po stobs dang ldan pa'i ming ngo / /sa gzhi yang

ni bcud ldan no/ /gnas der sprin rnams char 'bebs par byed do/ /der ni b+ha ga la brtI zhes pa'i rdzing bu'o/ /gang du gnod sbyin tshogs dang lhan cig tu gnas so/ /der ni rtag tu shing gi 'bras/ /sna tshogs

bya rnams lhan cig gnas/ /rma bya khrung khrung sgra sgrogs shing / /khu byug rnams ni tshan tshan gnas/ /shang shang te'u sgra sgrogs shing / /de nas yang ni ngur pa dang / /gong mo nags kyi bya gag rnams/ /nags kyi

rdzing bur gnas pa'o/ /ne tso ri skegs de sgra 'byin/ /daN Ta mA na bya dkar dang / /dus kun du ni mdzes par byed/ /lus ngan rgyal po'i rdzing rtag mdzes/ /'di ni byang gi phyogs kyi yul/ /skye bo rnams ni 'di bzhin

brjod/ /de yi phyogs ni yongs skyong ba'i/ /rgyal po chen po grags dang ldan/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /'di yi ming ni lus ngan po/ /gnod sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa ni/ /glu dang gar gyis dga' bar byed/ /

de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /de ni dgu bcu rtsa gcig go/ /de yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / /nyi ma'i gnyen gyi sangs rgyas ni/ /'jigs dang bral ba chen po la/ /

thag ring nas ni phyag bgyi'o/ /skyes bu cang mkhyen khyed phyag 'tshal/ /skyes bu mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo/ /dge ba rtag tu gsung ba la/ /mi ma yin rnams khyed phyag 'tshal/ /rtag tu 'di ni nyan pa'o/ /de phyir de ltar 'di

brjod do/ /rgyal ba gau tam phyag gyis shig /rgyal ba gau tam phyag bgyid do/ /rig pa dang ni zhabs su ldan/ /sangs rgyas gau tam phyag 'tshal lo/ /'dir ni drang srong chen po lcang lo can dang bcas pas bsrungs shig /dge slong ngam dge slong

ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po gang su dag dge slong dang bcas pa 'am dge slong ma dang bcas pa 'am/ dge bsnyen dang bcas pa 'am

dge bsnyen ma dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'dir lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis de bsrung ba dang / yongs su rdzogs pa thams cad yongs su zung shig /de yang mi ma yin rnams so/ /gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu pho 'am

gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ /dri za pho 'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu pho 'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am dri za'i 'khor ram

dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho 'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i

bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen po 'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang / sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang / gnas pa dang lhan cig tu

gnas pa dang / nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba rnams la/ drang srong chen po 'di rnams ni mi ma yin rnams zhes bya'o/ /grong ngam grong rdal lam/ bkur stir byed pa 'am sti stang du byed pa rnams/ drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams

kyis de thob pa ma yin no/ /rgyal po chen po'i pho brang lcang lo can zhes bya ba gzhi 'am gnas sa med do/ /drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams kyis gnod sbyin dang lhan cig tu gnas pa 'am mi 'thob po/ /drang srong chen po gzhan yang

mi ma yin rnams kyi bka' mnyan par bya'o/ /drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis bdag la phan pa rdzogs pa dang / pha rol la smod pa dang / rtsod pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams la snod mer rab tu

'bar ba mgo la bkon pa dang / drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin rnams kyis mgo bo tshal pa bdun du gsheg par byed do/ /drang srong chen po gzhan yang mi ma yin ni gtum pa dang drag pa dang khro ba'o/ /de rnams kyis 'di ltar

rgyal po chen po la brjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na skyes bu la sogs pa la rjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po'i skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen

po de yang mi ma yin rnams rgyal po la 'gal ba smra ba'o/ /drang srong chen po 'di lta ste/ ma ga d+ha'i yul gyi rgyal po la chom rkun byung na de ma thag tu rgyal po la brjod par byed do/ /rgyal po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i

skyes bu la brjod par byed do/ /skyes bu la brjod par ma nus na/ de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed pa bzhin no/ /drang srong chen po de yang ma ga d+ha'i rgyal po la chom rkun gyis gnod par byed par brjod do/ /drang srong chen po

'di lta bu'i mi ma yin yod pa rnams gtum pa dang drag po dang khro ba'o/ /de ma thag tu rgyal po chen po rnams la brjod par byed do/ /rgyal po chen po la brjod par ma nus na rgyal po'i skyes bu la brjod par byed do/ /skyes bu la

brjod par ma nus na de'i 'og ma'i skyes bu la rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po mi ma yin rnams rgyal po chen po rnams la 'gal ba rjod par byed do/ /drang srong chen po mi ma yin gang zhig gnod sbyin nam gnod sbyin mo 'am

gnod sbyin gyi bu 'am gnod sbyin gyi bu mo 'am gnod sbyin gyi blon po chen po 'am gnod sbyin gyi 'khor ram gnod sbyin gyi g.yog 'khor ram/ dri za pho 'am dri za mo 'am dri za'i bu pho 'am dri za'i bu mo 'am dri za'i blon po chen po 'am

dri za'i 'khor ram dri za'i g.yog 'khor ram/ grul bum pho 'am grul bum mo 'am grul bum gyi bu pho'am grul bum gyi bu mo 'am grul bum gyi blon po chen po 'am grul bum gyi 'khor ram grul bum gyi g.yog 'khor ram/

klu pho 'am klu mo 'am klu'i bu pho 'am klu'i bu mo 'am klu'i blon po chen po 'am klu'i 'khor ram klu'i g.yog 'khor rnams rab tu sdang ba'i sems kyis dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams

'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba 'am rjes su 'gro ba dang sdod pa dang lhan cig tu sdod pa dang nyal ba dang lhan cig tu nyal ba dang / 'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang / gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon

chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar

byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis mi gtong bar byed do/ /gnod sbyin rnams

dang gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang / sde dpon chen po rnams gang zhe na/ dbang po zla ba chu zla dang / /b+hA ra dwa dza skye dgu'i bdag /tsan da na dang 'dod mchog dang / /mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /

lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / /de bzhin ri dang gangs can dang / /gang ba smin drug phug dang ni/ /'tshe ba dang ni btang bzung dang / /sna tshogs bshes gnyen gnya'

shing 'dzin/ /sa skyongs rab tu rtogs pa dang / /ngo tsha mig dang khang pa dang / /lnga len gtum pa A la ba ka /srid sgrub yid bzang bzhin bzang dang / /zho gdong nor bu nor bu spyod/ /de bzhin dbang phyug dang bcas so/ /

'di rnams ni gnod sbyin rnams dang gnod sbyin chen po rnams dang / sde dpon rnams dang sde dpon chen po rnams la gsol bar byed pa dang / nga ro sgrogs par byed pa dang / sgra cher sgrogs par byed pa'o/ /'dir gnod sbyin gyis bzung nas

gnod sbyin 'dis tshe 'phrog par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis 'tshe bar byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par tho 'tsham par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis gnod par byed pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis rnam par gnod par byed

pa dang / gnod sbyin 'dis ni mi gtong bar byed do/ /drang srong chen po 'dis ni lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig /dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang 'tshe

ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /drang srong chen po da ni bdag cag rnams 'gro bar bgyi'o/ /bdag cag rnams ni bya ba mang ba dang / byed pa mang bas so/ /dge slong dag bdag gis da ni rgyal po chen po rnams

la 'gro ba'i gnang ba byin no/ /de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams langs nas bdag la phyag byas te/ bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /dge slong dag gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang langs nas bdag la

phyag byas bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag gis bdag la bsnyun gsol te/ bsnyun gsol nas snying po dang snying po med pa ji ltar zhes zhus pa de rnams de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang su dag

gis bdag ga la ba der thal mo sbyar nas 'dud pa byas te mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig gis ming dang rigs rnam par dpyad nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /gang la la zhig cang mi smra bar gyur te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /

dge slong dag kha don du zung la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig /dge slong dag chongs la lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig /dge slong dag don dang bcas pas lcang lo can gyi pho brang gis bsrungs shig /

dge slong ngam dge slong ma 'am/ /dge bsnyen nam dge bsnyen ma rnams la bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / 'tshe ba med pa dang / bde ba dang legs par gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong
de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /skabs rab mchog gnyis pa ste lcang lo can gyi pho brang gi mdo rdzogs s+ho// // rgya gar skad du/ ma hA sa ma ya sU tra/ bod skad du/
'dus pa chen po'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong

gi dge 'dun chen po lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun

rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ /de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i ris bzhi po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ /'dir yang bcom ldan 'das kyis shAkya'i yul ser skya'i gzhi'i tshal chen po na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po

lnga brgya ste/ de thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so/ /'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha rnams de ma thag tu 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams blta ba'i phyir ro/ /gang dag

de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der de dag song ste song nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa so sor brjod par bya'o/ /de nas lha de rnams kyis 'di lta ste skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las/

brkyang ba tsam dang brkyang ba las bskum pa de bzhin du gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams mi snang bar gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du snang bar gyur to/ /de nas lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu

'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas yang lha de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di rnams gsol to/ /'dus pa chen po'i tshal 'di ru/ /lha yi tshogs rnams 'dus pa ste/ /chos 'di'i

phyir du bdag 'ongs pa/ /dge 'dun mi pham 'dus pa blta/ /de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /dge 'dun sems rnams dul ba dang / /rang gi sems ni drang

por byas/ /kha lo sgyur bas drang por 'dzin/ /de bzhin mkhas pas dbang po bsrung / /de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /khyim gyi 'ching ba bton pa dang / /

dbang po nas ni sems 'gro zhing / /dag cing dri med der 'gro ba/ /mig ldan glang po dul ba bzhin/ /de nas lha gzhan rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to/ /gang zhig sangs rgyas skyabs

'gro ba/ /de ni ngan song 'gro mi 'gyur/ /mi yi lus ni spangs nas su/ /lha yi lus ni yongs rdzogs 'gyur/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams bos te de ma thag tu dge slong dag 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i lha

rnams 'dus te de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa blta ba'i phyir ro/ /dge slong gang de rnams su gyur pa 'das pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de rnams bcom ldan 'das de tsam du

gyur pa de bzhin du lha rnams 'dus par gyur to/ 'di lta ste/ bdag kyang dge slong dag de bzhin du 'dus par gyur to/ /'di lta ste/ bdag kyang 'di skad ces smra ste/ dge slong dag lha'i tshogs rnams kyi ming brjod par bya ste/

dge slong dag rab tu gsol bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i lha'i tshogs dang / dge slong dag lha'i tshogs ston par byed pa zhes bya ba'o/ /de thos nas legs par yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad par bya'o/ /de ltar btsun pa
bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de rnams kyis so sor zhus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /tshigs su bcad pa so sor bshad/ /gang du sa gzhi mthong gyur na/ /ri yi phug du gang gnas
pa/ /de ru mnyam par 'jog par byed/ /sa gzhir seng ge 'jigs med bzhin/ /ba spu tsam yang g.yo ba med/ /sems ni dag cing dkar ba dang / /chu ni rab tu dngas bzhin du/ /lnga brgya po yis legs
shes shing / /ser skya'i tshal gyi gnas mang po/ /de nas dge slong ston pas bos/ /bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos rnams/ /lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/ /dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/ /
lus ni gdung bar ma byed par/ /sangs rgyas bstan pa thos pas so/ /de rnams ye shes snang bar 'gyur/ /mi ma yin rnams mthong 'gyur ba/ /gang zhig gis ni brgya mthong zhing / /stong dang bdun bcu

mthong ba yin/ /brgya dang stong phrag gcig dang ni/ /mi ma yin rnams mthong bar 'gyur/ /gang zhig gis ni mtha' med mthong / /phyogs kun gang bar 'gyur ba mthong / /de rnams kyis ni rtogs pa dang / /spyan ldan

rnam par dpyad nas ni/ /de phyir ston pa yis ni bos/ /bstan la dga' ba'i nyan thos kyis/ /lha yi tshogs rnams 'ongs nas ni/ /dge slong rnams kyis de shes bya/ /gang zhig la ni bdag bshad bya/ /go rims bzhin

du mnyan par gyis/ /stong phrag bdun gyi gnod sbyin rnams/ /ser skya'i sa la gnas pa ni/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge

slong tshal du'o/ /stong phrag drug ni gangs can gyi/ /gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi ba dge slong

tshal du'o/ /sna tshogs bshes gnyen lnga brgya po/ /gnod sbyin kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong
tshal du'o/ /rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni/ /ngos yangs ri la gnas pa yin/ /stobs ldan 'bum phrag gcig po ni/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor/ /rgyal khab gnod sbyin chu srin ni/ /

zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /shar gyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/ /ming ni yul 'khor srung zhes pa/ /dri za rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu

thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /lho yi phyogs kyi'ang rgyal po ni/ /

ming ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya/ /grul bum rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan

zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/ /ming ni mig mi bzang zhes grags/ /klu rnams kyi ni bdag po ste/ /

rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs dang ldan/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing stobs dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya

phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /byang gi phyogs kyi rgyal po ni/ /de ming lus ngan po zhes grags/ /gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag po ste/ /rgyal po chen po grags chen ldan/ /de yi bu ni mang po

rnams/ /ming ni gcig tu thos pa ste/ /dbang po zhes bya stobs chen po/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /

shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor skyong / /lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po/ /nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / /byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po/ /de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi/ /phyogs rnams bzhi po kun du'o/ /

gzi brjid 'bar bas 'khod nas ni/ /ser skya'i gzhi yi tshal du'o/ /de rnams sgyu ma rtsed mo bsam/ /drung ldan rnams ni nam mkhar 'khod/ /sgyu ma sku Te t+ya bai Ta Nu/ /bir+ya ts+tsha bir+ya To bcas/ /tsan da na dang 'dod

mchog dang / /mgul pa mdzes dang mgul nges dang / /skye dgu'i bla mar gyur pa dang / /lha las byung ba'i kha lo pa/ /dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/ /mi rgyal rgyal ba'i khyu mchog dang / /mdun du rtse mo lnga de bzhin/ /g.yer ma dang ni nyi

zer dang / /de dang gzhan gyi rgyal po rnams/ /rgyal po dri za dang bcas dang / /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /de nas gzhan yang nam mkha'i klu/ /yangs pa can du lhan cig gnas/ /la ba rta yi mchog

dang ni/ /rab 'gro gnyen dang lhan cig pa/ /ya mu na dang yul 'khor skyong / /klu yi spun dang grags ldan dang / /sa srung glang po chen po rnams/ /de yang nags kyi tshal du'o/ /gang zhig klu rgyal myur du len/ /lha dang bya dang rnam dag mig /

nam mkha' las 'ongs tshal der sleb/ /sna tshogs 'dab bzang ces de'i ming / /'jigs med byin pas klu yi rgyal/ /mkha' lding bzod pa rtogs pas so/ /phan tshun du ni mi rtsod cing / /klu khyung sangs rgyas skyabs 'gro ba/ /rdo rje lag gis

rgyal ba dang / /lha ma yin ni rgya mtshor gnas/ /spun rnams de yi gnas dang ni/ /gzi brjid ldan zhing grags dang ldan/ /nag po mig sman 'jigs byed ldan/ /lha ma yin rnams khro byed dang / /thag bzang dang ni thag bzang ris/ /

mtshan 'joms na mo tsi dang bcas/ /stobs kyi bu ni brgyad po rnams/ /thams cad rnam par snang mdzad med/ /stobs kyi sde ni go bgos pa/ /sgra gcan bzang po sngon du 'gro/ /btsun pa de ni 'dus nas ni/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /

chu dang lha dang sa dang ni/ /me dang rlung yang der 'ongs so/ /chu lha chu yi lha dang ni/ /zla ba dang ni grags par ldan/ /byams dang snying rje'i tshogs can dang / /lha ni grags ldan mdun du'o/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs

rnams ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /khyab 'jug lha dang lhan

cig tu/ /tha dad tha dad 'ongs pa dang / /zla ba de yi 'khor gyi lha/ /zla ba'i mdun byas 'khor dang ni/ /nyi ma'i 'khor gyi lha rnams dang / /nyi ma'i mdun byas 'khor dang ni/ /rgyu skar de yi 'khor dang yang / /mdun byas pa la

ha ka dang / /sa dang sa yi gtso bo dang / /brgya byin yang yang sbyin pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang / /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /

chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /de nas nyer spyod lha dang ni/ /chu dang me yi rtse mo bzhin/ /sgra ldan snang bar byed pa dang / /u ma'i me tog de bzhin du/ /chu lha dang bcas chos dang ni/ /a ts+tsu ta dang

du ma rnams/ /bzang len mdzes pa'i mdun dang ni/ /mdun dang gnas dang du ma dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par

ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /'dus dang 'dus pa chen po ni/ /mi dang mi yi mchog dang ni/ /rol pa'i go 'phang mdun du dang / /yid mchog dang ni go 'phang rtse/ /de nas lha yi mchod 'os dang / /

gang yang dmar po'i gos gyon dang / /pha rol pha rol son chen dang / /grags chen lha'i mdun gnas dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /

kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /dkar dang drod dang dmar po dang / /sngon shugs stug po lhan cig dang / /dkar po 'dzin pa la sogs dang / /mkhas pa'i lha

ni sngon du'o/ /rtag tu glang chen myos 'phrang ba/ /'dres pa grags dang ldan pa dang / /pra dz+dzun mang po mdun du dang / /gang zhig phyogs ni mdzes pa dang / /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs rnams dang / /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs

lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan/ /kha dog dang ni grags par ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs te/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /dge ba dga' ldan 'thab bral dang / /grags ldan shing dang ldan pa dang / /'phyang

ba gnas dang gtso bo dang / /'od dang bsam pa zhes bya dang / /'phrul dga' ba ni sngon du dang / /de nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed sngon/ /phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tshogs dang ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing

'od dang ldan/ /chos gtam bya phyir 'dir 'ongs nas/ /zhi bas dge slong tshal du'o/ /sna tshogs drug po'i sde pa ni/ /thams cad kha dog sna tshogs lus/ /ming ni grags dang ldan pa sngon/ /khang gzhan 'dra ba lhan cig tu/ /ma lus

rigs ni brjod pa dang / /zag med tshogs ni pha rol brgal/ /glang chen tshogs ni blta ba dang / /zla ba bzhad pa gsum ldan dang / /tshangs bzang mchog gi thob pa dang / /rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i bu dang ni/ /de yi dga' ba'i gzhon nu ni/ /

de rnams zhi bas tshal du'o/ /tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong du ni/ /tshangs pa chen po nye bar 'khod/ /'od dang ldan par skye ba dang / /grags ldan sna tshogs lus dang ni/ /dbang phyug bcu po sngon du dang / /so so dbang du gyur pa dang / /

de yi dbus dang sngon du dang / /'phrog ma 'khor dang bcas pa'o/ /de rnams thams cad 'ongs gyur nas/ /dbang po lha dang tshangs bcas 'ongs/ /bdud kyi sde rnams 'ongs nas ni/ /gau tam thugs ni blta ba dang / /'di ni zung cig

chings shig brjod/ /chags pa glang po bcings pa bzhin/ /'khor dang bcas pas bskor nas ni/ /gang du 'ang stong pa ma yin no/ /de la 'di ni bde chen dang / /gau tam sde la gnod mi nus/ /lag pa thal mo rdebs

pa dang / /'jigs par byed pa'i cho nge sgrogs/ /ji ltar rlung gis sprin rnams dang / /mun nag glog dang bcas pa ni/ /de ma thag tu 'jigs dang bral/ /bsam pa khro ba med par gnas/ /lha de rnams thams cad dang tshangs pas

bcom ldan 'das la phyag byas te bskor ba byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to/ /bdud kyi sde de rnams kyang cang mi smra ba'i tshul gyis song ngo / /ston pas nyan thos bstan pa la dga' ba rnams bos te/ de yang 'jigs pa med

byed dang / /dag pa'i sangs rgyas bstan pa la/ /'jigs med 'dod chags bral ba ni/ /de yi ba spu'ang g.yo ba med/ /g.yul ni kun las rgyal ba dang / /'jigs pa 'das shing grags par ldan/ /lha dang lhan cig
brjod pa dang / /nyan thos rnams ni der gnas so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong de rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ /'dus pa chen po'i

mdo rdzogs s+ho// // // rgya gar skad du/ mai tri sU tra/ bod skad du/ byams pa'i mdo/ 'phags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo/ /ston pa dus gcig na ser skya'i gzhi dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga'

ra ba dang / chu klung ro hi ni'i 'gram na bzhugs so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus ma 'ongs pa'i rgyal ba de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ khyed kyi rjes bstan blo brtan ni/ /ci 'dra'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar/ /
spyan ldan yongs su rgyas par ni/ /bdag ni rab tu nyan par 'dod/ /gnas brtan zhus pa gsan nas ni/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad gsungs/ /bsod nams phung po mi nyung ba'i/ /grags pa chen po mi

pham pa'i/ /yon tan thams cad brjod mi nus/ /mdor bsdus nas ni legs bshad pa/ /phyogs gcig tsam ni bstan par bya/ /shA ri'i bu nyon nga yi tshig /'di ni bskal pa bzang po ste/ /skye ba bye ba'i lo ru ni/ /

byams pa zhes pa'i ming nyid kyis/ /rkang gnyis mchog gi sangs rgyas so/ /ji ltar nga 'das nas dang por dus lnga 'byung ste/ 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus dang / bsgrub pa'i bar gyi dus dang / lung gi bar gyi dus dang /

rtags tsam gyi bar gyi dus dang / sku gdung gi bar gyi dus so/ /de la 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus ni/ sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/ lo stong phrag gcig gi nang du rtogs pa bskyed par nus so/ /

de song zhing song ba'i dus so/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'o/ /de rnams yod pa na 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus med ces brjod par mi bya'o/ /lhag ma ni rgyun du zhugs pa ste/ de 'das

nas 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni 'bras bu'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus zhes bya ba ni/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi lam gyi 'bras bu bslab par mi nus par/ pham pa bzhi po

bsrung bar nus pa tsam mo/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su/ pham pa bzhi po nyid bsrung ba tsam mo/ /pham pa bzhi po srung bar byed pa ni/ dge slong rnams stong phrag gcig gi nang na brgya tsam yod na yang sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa

zhes mi bya'o/ /brgya'i nang na dge slong gcig tsam yod pa las sdom pa zhig pa dang / shi ba na sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/ /'di ni sgrub pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya'o/ /lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba ni/

sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab sde snod gsum po'i don mi go zhing sgra tsam klog pa dang / po ti yod pa'i bar ni lung gi bar gyi dus yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su rtsod pa'i dus kyi rgyal po rnams chos ma

yin pa byed par 'gyur ro/ /blon po la sogs pa rnams kyang chos ma yin pa byed par 'gyur te/ de nas yul 'khor rnams dang / ljongs rnams kyang de bzhin no/ /de rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i rgyu yis lha rnams char

legs par mi 'bebs so/ /'bru rnams legs par mi smin no/ /de rnams kyi 'bru ma smin pas dge slong gi dge 'dun la bza' ba ster mi nus so/ /dge slong rnams kyis kha zas ma rnyed pas slob ma dang yang slob rnams

'dzin par mi nus so/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su lung gi bar gyi dus dman pa'o/ /dang po ni rab tu byed pa chen po nyams par 'gyur ro/ /de nub nas ya ma ka~M gi tshigs su bcad pa dang / gzhi dang gang zag dang gdags pa dang /

sku gdung gi gtam dang / rnam 'byed dang / chos bsdu ba nub par 'gyur ba'o/ /chos mngon pa'i sde snod nub nas/ mdo sde'i sde snod nub par 'gyur ro/ /de nas a~M ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro/ /a~M ga phyi ma'i sde pa nub

nas/ yang dag par ldan pa'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro/ /bar ma'i sde pa dang ring po'i sde pa nub par 'gyur ro/ /ring po'i sde pa nub nas 'dul ba dang bcas pa'i skyes rabs gnas so/ /'dul ba'i sde snod la yang ngo tsha dang ldan

pa tsam 'dzin no/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su skyes pa'i rabs tsam yang 'dzin par mi nus so/ /dang po thams cad sgrol gyi skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro/ /tha mar lo ma med pa'i skyes pa'i rabs nub par 'gyur ro/ /

skyes rabs rnams nub nas 'dul ba'i sde snod 'ba' shig 'dzin no/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi gsung rab kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam dar bar byed na/ lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa

med do/ /gang zhig rgyal po chos la dad pa'i dus su glang po che'i rgyab du gser gyi za ma tog gcig bzhag ste/ nor stong phrag gcig de ru bcug nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gang gis

shes pa des nor stong phrag de long zhes grong khyer gyi dbus su rol mo'i sgra lan gsum bsgrags nas de skad brjod de/ de len par ma nus pa na nor stong phrag de rgyal po'i mdzod du yang 'jog go/ /de'i dus ni lung gi bar gyi

dus nub pa'i dus su 'gyur ro/ /'di ni lung gi bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su/ chos gos 'dzin pa dang / lhung bzed 'dzin pa dang / gcer bu pa'i dge sbyong dang 'dra bar

chag tshang ku ba'i snod/ slong ba'i snod dang / lag pa'i rtse mo la 'phyang ba'i tshul dang 'dra ba dang / dra ba'i nang du khyer nas 'gro ba'o/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su/ gos ngur smrig gis bdag la ci byed/ cung zad chos su byas pa'i dum

bu lag pa 'am/ mgrin pa 'am/ rna ba rnams su 'am/ skra rnams la 'gebs so/ /bag ma len pa dang / so nam dang / tshong la sogs pa byas nas/ 'tsho ba'i phyir du spyod cing 'gro bar byed do/ /de'i tshe yon ster cing dge 'dun gyi ched du de

thams cad ster bar byed de/ de'i tshe ngas kun dga' bo dge 'dun gyi yon gyi 'bras bu ni grangs med par bshad do/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su/ 'di ci bdag gi don du ngur smrig gi dum bu btogs nas dgon pa 'am nags tshal du skyur bar

byed do/ /de rnams kyi dus su rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub par 'gyur ro/ /'di ni rtags tsam 'dzin pa'i bar gyi dus nub pa'i dus zhes bya ba yin no/ /de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa lo stong phrag

lnga pa la rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa'i rnyed pa chung ngo / /sku gdung rnams rnyed bkur byed pa'i gnas su 'gro bar byed do/ /song zhing song ba'i dus su/ gnas cad du bkur sti dang sti stang ma thob nas/ bstan pa tha ma'i dus su klu'i yul

dang / lha'i 'jig rten dang / tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas thams cad nas 'ongs nas/ sku gdung thams cad byang chub kyi snying po kho nar bsdus te sangs rgyas kyi sku ru gyur nas/ gshin rje rdzu 'phrul du ma ston pa dang 'dra bar

gzhan la ston no/ /de'i gnas su sems can mir gyur pa'i ming yang med do/ /stong phrag bcu'i lha'i 'jig rten gyi khor yug gi bar thams cad 'dus nas/ de ring stobs bcu pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed do/ /

deng nas bzung nas mun nag tu gyur to/ /zhes ngu bar byed do/ /sku gdung thams cad la me'i khams langs nas de'i sku lus lhag ma med par sreg par byed do/ /'di ni sku gdung gi bar gyi dus nub pa zhes bya ba yin no/ /
de nas lo stong phrag lnga po 'dir bstan pa nub par gyur nas 'jig rten pa rnams la mi dge ba lhag par 'phel bar byed do/ /zhes bya ba'i don no/ /mi rnams la ngo tsha dang khrel med par 'gyur zhing ma

dang / bu mo dang / sring mo la sogs pa'i 'du shes med par 'gyur ro/ /phag dang ce spyang la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ngo tsha med par 'gyur ro/ /de nas mi dge ba la sbyor zhing tshe bri nas tshe lo bcu par 'gyur ro/ /

lo lnga pa'i khye'u la lo lnga pa'i bu mo bag mar len no/ /yang lo lnga'i nang nyid du bu dang bu mo dang tsha bo dang tsha mo 'ang 'byung ngo / /de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /bskal pa bar
ma gsum ste/ mu ge'i bskal pa bar ma dang / nad kyi bskal pa bar ma dang / mtshon gyi bskal pa bar ma'o/ /de la gang gi tshe 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la 'dod pa lhag par skyes nas
mu ge'i bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe gti mug lhag par che ste/ nad kyi bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro/ /gang gi tshe skyon du gyur pa de'i dus su mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mar 'gyur ro/ /
mu ge'i bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas yi dags su skye bar 'gyur ro/ /nad kyi bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas dud 'gror skye bar byed do/ /
mtshon gyi bskal pa bar mas sems can rnams brlag par byas nas dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe mi rnams phan tshun du ri dgas kyi 'du shes dang bcas pa thob par gyur nas mtshon so
gcig pa dang / mtshon so gnyis pa dang / spu gri'i so dang 'dra ba'i mtshon cha rnams bzung nas phan tshun gsod par byed do/ /de rnams su mkhas pa gang zhig
des 'joms par thos nas ri'i sul la sogs par zhag bdun gyi kha zas bzung ste yib nas sdod do/ /de rnams su ma yib pa'i sems can lhag ma rnams phan tshun du brdeg cing gsod do/ /sa gzhi thams cad sha

dang khrag tu 'gyur ro/ /de'i dus su sprin chen po 'dus nas char 'bebs par byed do/ /lha yis char bab pa'i rjes su dri zhim pa'i char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do/ /de rnams kyi dus su gnas thams cad yid du 'ong bar 'gyur

ro/ /gnas thams cad dag par gyur nas 'bras shun pa can gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /'bras shun pa can gyi char phab pa'i rjes su 'bras shun pa med pa'i char 'bab cing 'bab par 'gyur ro/ /de'i rjes su gos dang

rgyan gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do/ /de'i mthar pus mo nub tsam gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bab cing 'bab par byed do/ /de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri zhim pa yi char 'bab

cing / /shun can shun med 'bras kyi char/ /gos dang rgyan gyi char 'bab pa/ /de ltar dga' tshal mdzes pa bzhin/ /rin chen sna bdun ma lus pa'i/ /de yi gnas su char 'bab po/ /gnas kun gang bar byas nas ni/ /de tshe

dga' tshal mdzes pa bzhin/ /de rnams 'das nas mi yib pa rnams 'thon te/ de rnams 'thon nas phan tshun du 'khyud pa dang / ngu ba dang / tshul khrims lnga las sogs pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams rjes su dran par byas nas

rdzogs par rtsom mo/ /de nas tshe lo bcu pa'i mi rnams las skyes pa'i bu dang bu mo tshe lo nyi shu par 'phel lo/ /de nas mi rnams la lhag par chos 'phel bas go rims bzhin du tshe 'phel te tshe lo grangs med par

'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sems can rnams la rgas pa dang 'chi ba mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de ltar sems can gzhan yang bag yod par 'gyur te/ dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal zhes bya ba ni ci zhes sems can rnams sems

pa med do/ /de nas tshe lo grangs med pa rnams 'bri bar byed do/ /sngar bzhin du bri nas tshe lo brgyad khri par 'gyur ro/ /de'i dus su 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lha'i bu mo'i skal ba dang 'dra bar bud med dang / de ltar skyes pa

dang bcas pas gang bar 'gyur ro/ /lha'i char pa zla ba phyed du 'bab pa dang / zhag bcu dang / zhag lnga dang / nyin zhag phyed du sa'i bcud 'phel bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i tshe sa gzhi thams cad kyi cha mnyam pa dang / tsher ma dang shing rad rod

med cing / grong khyer la phyogs bzhi'i sgo dang ldan pa dang / grong khyer gyi dbus su dpag bsam gyi shing skye bar 'gyur ro/ /de'i phyir gsungs pa/ de nas de yi grong khyer ni/ /sna tshogs tshong 'dus so so dang / /legs par rab byung rdzing

bu dang / /dga' zhing rab tu gnas pa dang / /dri ma med pa'i chu chen po/ /shin du grang zhing dri bzang ldan/ /rnyog med mnyam zhing tshim pa dang / /de nas rnyog ma yang dag gnas/ /pad ma ud pal gyis gang zhing / /rba rlabs dang ni rnyog

pa med/ /ta la'i phreng ba bdun gnas zhing / /rin chen rang bzhin gyis khyebs pa/ /lcags ri bdun dang ldan pa dang / /grong khyer thams cad 'brel ba dang / /rtswa can rgyal po'i pho brang ni/ /de tshe tog dang ldan par 'gyur/ /grong khyer

phyogs kyi sgo bzhi ru/ /dpag bsam shing ni skye bar 'gyur/ /sngon po ser po dmar po dang / /dkar po rab tu gsal ba'i 'od/ /lha yi gos ni skye bar 'gyur/ /lha yi drin gyis rgyan dang ni/ /longs spyod nye bar spyod pa rnams/ /

thams cad steng nas 'phyang ba yin/ /de nas grong khyer dbus su ni/ /khang dmig bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ /bsod nams las kyis grub pa ni/ /dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung / /ras bal ras ni bzang po dang / /ko ma u

dum ba ra'i ras/ /bsod nams las kyis grub pa ni/ /dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung / /mri daM ga ni lag pas rdung / /mu ra rdza dang a lam b+ha/ /bsod nams las las byung ba ni/ /dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung / /

dpung rgyan dag gi rgyan dang ni/ /dpung rgyan dang ni do shal dang / /rin chen rang bzhin mgul pa'i rgyan/ /bsod nams las las byung ba ni/ /dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung / /dpral ba kha yi rgyan dang ni/ /nor bu

'og pag lus la ldan/ /bsod nams las las byung ba ni/ /dpag bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung / /gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i/ /rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan/ /bsod nams las las grub pa ni/ /dpag

bsam shing gi steng nas 'byung / /ma rmos ma btab rang byung ba'i/ /bsod nams las kyis skyes pa ni/ /ma zhig spun med dri ma med/ /'bras kyi 'bras bu dri zhim ldan/ /'bras rnams bed par btsos pa na/ /mi rnams yongs

su longs spyod do/ /de yi 'bras la zal zel med/ /stong phrag brgya ni 'byung ba yin/ /'bras kyi myu gu skye ba ni/ /thams cad du ni khyab par gnas/ /'bras snye re re skye ba la/ /phul ni re re 'byung bar 'gyur/ /mi rnams kyi ni 'bras kyi dri/ /

thams cad du ni longs spyod do/ /stong phrag gnyis kyi shing rta'i tshad/ /shing rta brgya yi tshad tsam dang / /shing rta sum bcu rtsa dgu dang / /bre chen bcu drug pa yi khal/ /de nas yang ni ku ba gnyis/ /de lta bus 'bras 'byung ngo / /sa

bon gcig la skye ba ni/ /skye bo rnams kyi bsod nams las/ /gang zhig tog dang ldan par gnas/ /dung gi rgyal po mi yi bdag /de yi tshe na de ltar 'gyur/ /yon tan gyi ni dpung rgyan 'dzin/ /bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs/ /

bzhin legs rna ba'i rgyan dang ldan/ /ha ri tsan dan lus la byugs/ /ga shi'i gos ni mchog tu gyon/ /nor ni rgya cher mang ba deng / /ting cag pi wang gis sad byed/ /rtag tu shin du skyid pa dang / /de yi lus dang sems bde zhing / /dpag tshad stong

phrag bcu ru ni/ /'dzam bu gling ni gnas pa yin/ /tsher ma med cing shing med pa/ /mnyam zhing 'jam la sngo bsang gnas/ /de la nad ni gsum 'byung ste/ /'dod dang zhen dang rgas pa'o/ /lnga brgya'i lo lon bud med ni/ /rgan dang gzhon pa

bag mar len/ /gtan du gnyis ka bde ba yin/ /rtsod pa med par 'gyur ba yin/ /'bras bu lo tog phun sum tshogs/ /'khril shing gel pa shing gi tshal/ /rtswa ni sor bzhi pa ru skye/ /shin du 'jam pa'i shing bal

'dra/ /ha cang mi grang mi dro zhing / /char ni mnyam par 'bab pa dang / /rlung ni shin du chung ba dang / /dus tshod mnyam par ldan pa dang / /chu klung tA la mi dman zhing / /de dang de yi sa yi cha/ /sa la rdo ni chung ldan la/ /sran nag sran chung

tshad tsam mo/ /mu tig 'dra bas yongs su gang / /rgyan rnams bskyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ /dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/ /grong dang grong rdal mang pos gang / /de dang de ni nye ba ru/ /'od ma smyug phran tshal bzhin no/ /bya gag

'phur ba tsam nyid do/ /dge zhing rgyas la rdzu 'phrul ldan/ /lugs la nye bar 'tshe ba med/ /rtag tu rtse zhing dga' ba dang / /gcig tu bde bas tshim pa dang / /rgyu skar bde bas bskor ba dang / /dga' zhing tshim la rab tu dga'/ /bza'

dang btung ba mang po za/ /sha chang chu bzhin mang ba ni/ /lha yi pho brang cang lo bzhin/ /khang bzang rgyal po'i pho brang ni/ /nyams dga' sgra mi snyan bzhin no/ /'dzam bu'i gling yang de bzhin gyur/ /de'i dus su byang chub sems dpa'

byams pa 'di ni bskal pa grangs med pa bcu drug dang bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag tsam du sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa sum bcu rdzogs par byas nas thams cad sgrol bzhin du skye ba lhag ma'i lus

sbyin pa chen por byas shing / pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te/ de'i lus zhig nas dga' ldan du skye ba rdzogs par byas nas/ sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs so/ /stong phrag bcu'i 'khor yug gi lha rnams

ni sangs rgyas byon par 'gyur ro zhes dam 'cha'o/ /phyogs lngar gzigs te dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshogs rnams kyi 'khor gyis bskor la/ dga' ldan nas byon te/ tog ldan zhes bya ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang du/ dung gi rgyal po'i

tshangs bzang mdun na 'don bram ze'i rigs kyi tshangs ldan ma'i rum du zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu g.yos so/ /zla ba bcu 'das nas drang srong lhung ba dang ri dgas rgyu ba'i gnas su ma'i rum nas 'thon

te rim pa bzhin du shes pa dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag nyid kyi bsod nams kyi mthus sa gzhi btol nas steng du 'ongs te rin po che sna bdun gyi khang bzang bzhir rang nyid kyi lha bzhin du lha mo zla ba'i gdong can ma la sogs pa/ lha'i bu

mo bzhin du bud med mang po de rnams dang 'grogs nas/ lo stong phrag gcig lha bzhin du rjes su myong bar gyur te/ de'i nyin par rab tu byung ba'i gzugs gcig mthong nas gser gyi gzeb la mi dga' ba seng ge'i rgyal po bzhin du

dpal 'byor ma lus pa rdzogs pa rin po che'i khang bzang rnams la shin du mi dga' bar gyur nas nges par 'byung ba'i 'dod pa skyes so/ /thams cad stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi lha rnams lha'i me tog la sogs pa lag pas

blangs nas 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo 'di gcig tu 'dus te/ dung gi rgyal po la sogs pa'i skye bo chen pos bzung nas dri bzang dang phreng ba dang bdug spos la sogs pas khang bzang la bskor nas 'dug go/ /nam mkha'i lha

rnams kyis lha'i me tog lag pas bzung nas legs so zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig tu 'byin par byed do/ /'og min gyi bar du thams cad sgra gcig tu byed cing gnas so/ /de'i dus su rin po che'i khang bzang rdza mkhan gyi

'khor lo ltar 'khor zhing nam mkha' la 'gro'o/ /zla ba nya ba la rgyu skar gyi phreng bas bskor ba bzhin no/ /byang chub sems dpa'i btsun mo chen mo la sogs pa nam mkha' la bzhud do/ /gang zhig sems dpa' chen

po dang 'grogs nas 'gro ba'i sems kyis de rnams kyis rang rang gi nam mkha' mthong ste tshangs pa chen pos dpag tshad gsum gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin no/ /brgya byin lha'i rgyal pos dung la sogs pa

bzung nas 'bud do/ /de ltar dpal dang skal pa bzang po dang ldan pa'i lha dang mi'i tshogs kyis bskor nas khang bzang gi klu shing byang chub shing drung du gshegs so/ /de'i tshad ni khru brgya nyi shu yal ga'i bar/ /yal ga'i mtho

tshad de dang mnyam/ /'khril nas steng nas 'og tu 'phyang / /rma bya'i gdugs bzhin mdzes pa'o/ /rtag tu rtse mor me tog gsal/ /lha yi dri bzang bsung ldan zhing / /ge sar phul lu gang tsam mo/ /me tog bzang po 'khor

lo tsam/ /phyogs phyogs rlung gis 'khyer bar byed/ /dpag tshad bcu ru khyab pa'o/ /steng gi me tog 'og tu lhung / /byang chub snying por me tog brtsegs/ /de'i dus su nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i bya rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshogs

kyis sgra snyan pas mchod de/ de ltar klu shing gi byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te nam mkha' la 'phyang zhing sa'i cha thams cad nyams dga' ba'i gnas su sdod do/ /de la zhag bdun du dpal gyi snying por dka' ba spyod do/ /

tshangs pa chen pos blangs nas dngos po rnams bzung nas rab tu byung ngo / /ji snyed pa'i 'khor thams cad kyang rab tu byung ngo / /de nas gzhan yang stong phrag brgyad bcu rtsa bzhi yis/ /bram ze'i rig byed mchog shes

shing / /byams pa rab tu byung bar gyur/ /de dang de ni rab tu byung / /de la rab tu byung nas zla ba'i gdong can gyi lha mos shin du mngar ba'i 'o thug phul lo/ /yongs su longs spyad nas srod kyi thun la byang chub kyi shing drung du

sa mnyams nas skyil dkrung gis ma pham pa bzhugs so/ /shar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs su gzigs shing bzhugs so/ /rim pa bzhin du dus la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so sor rtogs so/ /'di skad

gsungs pa/ 'khor ba'i skye bo ma lus pa/ /dug med pa ni btsal ba'i phyir/ /dug med pa ni byed pa ni/ /yang yang skye ba sdug bsngal ba/ /khyim ni byed pa mthong bar 'gyur/ /khyim ni gzhan ni byed pa med/ /sdug

bsngal thams cad gzhig pa dang / /dug ldan khyim ni gzhig pa'o/ /sems kyi dug ni spong ba dang / /sred pa zad nas grol bar 'gyur/ /ched du brjod pa gsungs pa'o/ /byang chub kyi shing gi drung du zhag bzhi

bcu rtsa dgu bzhugs nas tshangs pas gsol ba 'debs pa'i phyir/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ched du drang srong lhung ba'i gnas su gshegs pa dang / de nas der gshegs pa na/ zhabs ni bteg dang bzhag pa na/ /me tog
